game.name: Vein-X
game.categories: Single-player, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A crash. Alone in a lab while war rages around you. Explore dark alien dungeons, mine rare minerals, build machines to survive and fight to uncover the truth buried deep below.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A crash. Alone in a lab while war rages around you. Explore dark alien dungeons, mine rare minerals, build machines to survive and fight to uncover the truth buried deep below.
